name: Add a Letter Multiple Choice Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text: Letter that appears three times in yellow fruit favoured by monkeys
Finish the film title:  "A Day __ the Races"
Beverage made by steeping leaves in water
A single drop of fluid from the eye
The use of humour or irony to expose political stupidity
Well bred ladies of history would never ride a horse this way
A natural catastrophe that causes great damage or loss of life
Heavenly bodies smaller than planets, but larger than meteoroids ... or an arcade game released in 1979 by Atari Inc.
